Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1941 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-1941 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.0.0-7, affected by CVE-2022-1941
